channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2025010608
item.description:
Report X-2025010608

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-03
  • City: RICHMOND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: undeclared pallet with UN3091 lithium metal batteries contained in equipment discovered after shrinkwrap was torn. Station was advised to hold for FAA inspection but failed to do so. Shipper has retrieved shipment.
